Description: Nice one-bedroom apartment for rent. Big room with a private balcony, hardwood floor. The apartment is on the second floor. Bus stop in front of the house. Easy to go Subway Malden Center and Wellington Station. Good credit and Tenant background check is needed. Young professionals and students are preferred. Credit check before signing the lease. A good landlord reference is needed. No smoking and small cats is fine. When you contact, please make a brief self-introduction of your group
